card.name: Cofounder Varduke
card.text: Improvise. At the beginning of each end step, if you activated a nonmana ability of a nontoken artifact this turn, create a 1/3 colorless artifact gnome creature token that has, "Sacrifice this permeant: Gain 3 life.". If a spell or ability would crate one or more tokens on your battlefield crate that many plus one instead.

card.name: Gairros, Abjurer P.H.D
card.text: As Gairros, Abjurer P.H.D, enters the battlefield, choose a color. Wizards & soldiers you control have hexproof from the chosen color. Whenever two or more wizards or soldiers you control attack, you may search your library for a white enchantment or white instant card, revile it & put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Beldes, Illusionist P.H.D.
card.text: Wizards you control have hexproof as long as you control an illusion. Illusions you control have menace. Whenever you cast a Blue spell with converted mana cost 3 or more, create a 2/2 blue illusion creature token, it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.".

card.name: Cofounder Raddik Balvire
card.text:
Cofounder Raddik Balvire, enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it, then proliferate X times. Spells & abilities you control have split second. Remove two counters from permanents you control: Tap or untap target permanent.
"This city will be built out of our sweat & held together by our resolve."

card.name: Kathrine, Evoker P.H.D
card.text: Wizards you control have prowess. Whenever you cast a red non-creature spell Kathrine, Evoker P.H.D deals 1 damage to each non-wizard permanent. {r}{r}, {t}: Target instant or sorcery in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

card.name: Cofounder Jessar
card.text:
First strike. Whenever you cast a instant or sorcery spell Cofounder Jessar, gets +3/+0 until the end of turn. Whenever you cast a instant or sorcery spell, flip a coin, if heads that spell gains rebound.
"Be bold where you can & lucky where you can't."

card.name: Cravin, Necromancer P.H.D
card.text: Whenever a skeleton or wizard you control is untapped it deals 1 damage to any target. Tap two untapped skeleton or zombie you control: Regenerate target swamp or black creature. Whenever another non-artifact non-token creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black skeleton creature token.

card.name: Cofounder Saulleam'Gart
card.text:
Flying, prowess, delve. {2}: Exile target card from any graveyard, if it was a creature or planeswaker put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, if it was a noncreature nonland, draw a card & loose 1 life, if it was land each opponent looses 2 life & you gain 2 life. This ability can be activated form the graveyard.
"We will rise from the ruins of our mistakes."

card.name: Dilfa, Blind Seer
card.text:
Prowess, vigilance. {w/u}{x}, {t}: Target player scrys X.
"Fate is a lie, I make my own way with my own will."

card.name: Balbodd, Transmuter P.H.D
card.text:
Spells that increase creature's you control power and/or toughness increase it by double that amount instead.
Whenever a wizard you control becomes the target of a spell, draw a card. The power and/or toughness of beasts you control cannot be decreased by spells, abilities and counters. (Changing a creature from a 3/3 to 1/1 is decreasing it.)

card.name: Cofounder Riverist
card.text:
Cofounder Riverist, has indestructible & prowess as long as your team controls a full party. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, you may have Cofounder Riverist, fight target creature or planeswalker you don't control. (Noncreature planeswalkers have a power of 0 when fighting.)
"From our deeds let the first kingless kingdom be born."

card.name: The Kelpie of Darkwater Cove
card.text: Whenever The Kelpie of Darkwater Cove, becomes blocked, destroy all creatures that are blocking it. Whenever The Kelpie of Darkwater Cove, deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards, and you draw a card for each card that was discarded this way. At the beginning of each player's end step, that player draws a card.

card.name: Skylark, The Tested
card.text: Flying. Players can't search there libraries unless they pay {2}. If a player searches there library for a card, they may instead search for any card, shuffle their library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Kurn Foultongue
card.text: First strike, wither. Sacrifice a creature: You may cast Kurn Foultongue, from your graveyard this turn. (This can be activated from the graveyard or on the battlefield.)

card.name: Sargoss, Born of Death
card.text: Trample. Whenever Sargoss, or another creature enters a graveyard from anywhere each opponent looses 1 life. Sargoss, Born of Death's power is equal to the number of creatures in all graveyards & in exile.

card.name: The Guardian of Respit Grove
card.text: Lifelink, vigilance. Whenever The Guardian of Respit Grove, deals damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it. It is said, a smart man will lay down his sword in the guardian's presents, a smarter man would never be there.— Grand Ma's Hearth Tails.

card.name: Dorren of the Old Ways
card.text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control for the first time each turn, create X 1/1 White bird creature tokens with flying, X is the number of enchantments you control. {2}{g}{w}, {t}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Create a token that is a copy of target enchantment.

card.name: Venfic, Aspect of Summer
card.text: Red & green creatures you control have First Strike, Reach & Menace. Venfic, has Indestructible as long as you control 3 or more other creatures. Venfic, has Hexproof as long as you control no other creatures.

card.name: The Lord of Bryte Refuge
card.text: Flying. You may play The Lord of Bryte Sanctum, from your graveyard or from exile. Whenever you cast another spell, if it was not cast from your hand, The Lord of Bryte Sanctum, deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Kels'Afar, Face of Fear
card.text: Kels'Afar, Face of Fear cannot be blocked. Protection from non-permanents. Whenever a creature becomes blocked by Kels'Afar, Face of Fear, destroy it. "Boo..."

card.name: Crypt Keeper Lenvic
card.text: Vigilance. Whenever a creature leaves a graveyard create a 1/1 white spirit creature token with flying. Whenever a noncreature card leaves a graveyard it's owner looses 1 life & you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lucky Vin
card.text: At the start of combat attach up to one target equipment you control to Vin, if you do, put a +1/+1 counter on him & draw a card. Whenever Vin attacks, it deals damage equal to the number of counters on him to up two other random creatures, planeswalkers or opponents. He survived The Tower of Bal'Tander, that alone should say something.

card.name: Thich, Roof Runner
card.text: First Strike, Trample, Haste. Whenever Thich, deals damage to a player, look at that player's hand & exile a nonland card from it. As long as that card remains in exile any player may play that card & uses mana as if it where mana of any color. Whenever an Opponents play a card, if was not played from their hand, Thich deal it's power to them.

card.name: The Ravenous Toby
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a food token. Sacrifice a food: Regenerate Toby & put a +1/+1 counter on it. If an ability of a permanent you control would trigger because of a creature attacking, it triggers twice instead.

card.name: Ao Jeel, The Fetid King
card.text: Whenever 1 or more counters are removed from a player or permanent put that many +1/+1 counters on Ao Jeel. Whenever Ao Jeel, or another permanent with counters on it leaves the battlefield for the first time each turn, put all those counters on any target permanent.

card.name: Virsteppado, Time Lost
card.text: +2: Look at the top three cards of your library put one in your hand one on the top and one on the bottom of your library. -3: Exile target creature, then add its mana cost as mana to your mana pool. -10: Create a Emblem with "At the end of each opponent's turn take an extra turn after.". Virsteppado can be your commander

card.name: Guru Kai, The Tranquil
card.text: Convoke. Elemental, Plant & Fungus spells have Convoke & Flash. Whenever a land or another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life, if you do & control that permanent you draw a card.

card.name: Ro, Peacekeeper of the Guild
card.text: Ro, Peacekeeper of the Guild enters the battlefield with a number of peace counters on it equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it. Remove a peace counter from Ro: Choose one — • Target creature's power becomes equal to it's toughness until the start of your next turn. • Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn. • Target creature is indestructible until the end of turn.

card.name: Ruuk, The Last Old One
card.text:
Flash. When Ruuk, enters the battlefield, exile all spells & abilities. Nonland permanents with mana value less then five cannot attack or block & looses all abilities.
"The end comes..."

card.name: Pyro Master, Crace
card.text: Instant & sorcery spells you control have wither. Whenever a spell you control cause an opponent to loose life you may pay {x}, if you do, draw X cards, then choose three cards in your hand & discard the rest.

card.name: Las & Sal, Betwixt Seers
card.text: Lifelink, Deathtouch At the beginning of your end step, reveal the top three cards of your library, Put one in your hand then you lose life equal to it's mana value, put the other cards in your graveyard & gain life equal to their total mana value. "With his return we will rise, with his victory we will transcend."

card.name: Malga, Cruel Sorceress
card.text: Lifelink, Deathtouch At the beginning of your end step, reveal the top three cards of your library, Put one in your hand then you lose life equal to it's mana value, put the other cards in your graveyard & gain life equal to their total mana value. "With his return we will rise, with his victory we will transcend."

card.name: Sansil, Betwixt Priestess
card.text: {w}{b}{g}, {t}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loose X life & draws X cards, X is the sacrificed creature's power. Whenever a player looses life, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature. Whenever you gain life put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Edgewalker Skris
card.text: Deathtouch, Lifelink. {1}, {t}: Choose for each color of mana used to activate this ability - •If {w} was spent two different target players each draws two cards. •If {b} was spent Edgewalker Skris, deals 1 damage to target creature. •If {g} was spent move any two counters from any permanents to target permanent.

card.name: Orphil, Scale Summoner
card.text: Shroud. {t}: Tokens you control phase out. Whenever a permanent phases in, create a green & black snake enchantment creature token with deathtouch, it gains haste this turn.

card.name: Bar'Des, Champion of Seasons
card.text: {g}{u}{r}, discard a card: Choose one— •Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. •Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. •Creatures with power 3 or less can't block this turn. "Winter, spring, summer and fall. Four seasons, four joys, four loves."

card.name: The Witch of Woodfall
card.text: Deathtouch, First Strike, Lifelink. Bargin - {t}: Starting with you each player pays {x}, then each player draws X cards & discards any number of cards, then The Witch of Woodfall, deals damage to each player equal to the number of cards drawn minus the number of cards discarded this turn.

card.name: Dulgen, Supreme Archmage
card.text:
{u}{r}{w}, discard a card: Choose one — • Dulgen, Voice of Raven'Cul, deals 4 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. • Put target creature on top of its owner's library. • Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.
What makes you think my city will follow your edicts? Is it because you where given the title of "King" as your nameday gift?

card.name: Sal & Las, Brides of Belial
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, that player looses 4 life, if that player has seven or more cards in hand that player discards until they have six cards in hand instead. Whenever three or more cards are put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, that player discards a card from their hand. "We wait... for soon he will return."

card.name: Vorn, Hound of Shangri La
card.text: First Strike. At the end of each combat Vorn phases out. At the start of each combat if Vorn is phased out it phases in untapped. It was on that day Vorn met the child apprentice of Lucian & both lives would forever change. -chapter 1, Wizards of War.

card.name: Da'Ki, Autumn's Savior
card.text: Flash, Trample, Deathtouch. Other faeries you control get +2/+1. Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls targets you or a fearie permanent you control, draw two cards, unless it's owner discards a card or pays {4}. "Good things come to those that lay in wait."

card.name: Eureka, Mother of Ideas
card.text: Hexproof, Indestructible. {g/u}, {t}: Each player draws a card. Never call a fae queen a queen, they don't understand the concept of rulers &l maybe offended, instead call her mother.

card.name: Cyn, The Loyal
card.text: Haste, Provoke, Indestructible. Cards you control attached to Cyn, The Loyal are indestructible. "He started down a horde of savages, not once did his resolve waver nor his blade flinch. Wave by wave he slaughtered the brutes & when the battle was won not a single savage would ever stand against him or the lands he called home ever again, not even his brother." -Leer Everclair to the sun king.

card.name: Gnarth Foul-Tongue
card.text: Card description and oracle text, including actions, effects, etc..

card.name: Wabbajack, the Pooka
card.text: Indestructible. {2}{u}: Untap Wabbajack, the Pooka. Whenever Wabbajack, the Pooka attacks or blocks, Put a +1/+1 counter on it. "Many think Wabbajack a myth, others not even that, but your grandpa knew the truth, rest his soul." -Grandma's fireplace stories

card.name: Polly, The Polymorphologist
card.text: Protection from blue. Polly, The Polymorphologist, may block any number of frog creatures. {g}{u}{u},{ut}, discard a card: Creatures target player owns become 1/1 blue frogs, loose all abilities & can't gain abilities until the end of the turn. (Even if they are outside the batlefield.)

card.name: BoomBoom, Storm's Wake
card.text: BoomBoom, Storm's Wake, costs {1} less for each Creature you don't control on the battlefield. Islandwalk, Trample. Whenever BoomBoom, leaves the battlefield it deals damage equal to it's power to each creature & planeswalker. "BoomBoom Pow!"

card.name: Rangor of the Claw
card.text: Rangor can't be countered & whenever you play Rangor, create a 4/4 legendary green bear creature token named Honey. Rangor & Bears you control have, Haste, Trample & Ward - Sacrifice a permanent. Rangor & Honey are Indestructible if it is your turn.

card.name: Marrin Riversist, Facsimile
card.text: Emblems loose all abilities. Whenever you draw one or more cards, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Remove a counter from target permanent. She has all of her memories and made from her flesh, then is she really just a copy with no soul?

card.name: Gale, Soul of Peace
card.text: Eminence- If a land enters the battlefield tapped it enters untapped instead. Vigilance, undying. Whenever a player cast the first spell in a turn, each of that player's opponents draws two cards. Each step makes not a sound, each hoof print moves not a flower.

card.name: Ro, Peacekeeper of the Guild
card.text: Ro, Peacekeeper of the Guild enters the battlefield with a number of peace counters on it equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it. Remove a peace counter from Ro: Choose one — • Target creature's power becomes equal to it's toughness until the start of your next turn. • Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn. • Target creature is indestructible until the end of turn.

card.name: Gar'Nova, Farfire Master
card.text: Flying, trample. If a creature you control fights a creature the excess damage is dealt to it's controller or a planeswalker that player controls of your choice instead. {g}{u}{r}: Gar'Nova fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Garth, The Death Head
card.text: {2}, Exile two cards from a single graveyard: For each of the exiled cards' types do the following— •Land or creature: Create a 2/2 black zombie creature token. •Instant or sorcery: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. •Enchantment or artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature {bull}Planeswalker or tribal: Proliferate.

card.name: Pyro Master, Crace
card.text: Protection from spells. Instant & sorcery spells you control have wither. Whenever a spell you control cause an opponent to loose life you may pay {x}, if you do, draw X cards, then choose three cards in your hand & discard the rest..

card.name: King Mergo, Deep Sea Seer
card.text: Whenever two or more creatures attack an opponent, defending player discards a card from their hand at random, if they can't, that player exiles the top six cards from their library instead. At the beginning of each end step, draw a card for each opponent that discarded or exiled a card from anywhere this turn. "I choose Freedom! I choose Belial!"

card.name: Roazim Dellaphonte
card.text: Flying, Ward - You draw three cards. Whenever you draw a card, gain 2 life. Whenever an opponent plays their first spell each turn, draw a card unless that player pays {2}.

card.name: King Cole, The Barbaric
card.text: Trample, Lifelink, Haste. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of their colors. As long as you control 3 or more other warriors Cole, is indestructible.

card.name: Belial Unchained
card.text: +1: Goad up to one target creature, it has provoke for as long as it is goaded. -2: Each player creates a emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep discard a card, if you do draw a card. Your max hand size is reduced by one. -7: Until the end of the turn, you may play cards from all graveyards, if a card would go to the graveyard from anywhere exile it instead.

card.name: The Trickster of Gold Peak
card.text: Flying, first strike. Whenever The Trickster of Gold Peak, becomes the target of a spell or ability the first time each turn you may change the target of that spell or ability to another legal target, then copy it. (You pick the target(s) for the copy.) {u}{r}{w}: Target spell or ability targets The Trickster, it becomes a legal target by that spell or ability this turn.

card.name: Shaper, The Void Weaver
card.text: +1: Remove a counter from any number of players, other permeants and exiled cards, then put that many loyalty counters on target planeswalker. -3: Manifest a card from your hand or top of your library, it enters with your choice of a Trample, Lifelink, Deathtouch, Flying or Haste counter. -10: For the rest of the game cards you control or own have Morph {5}, instant and sorcery cards that are turned face up on the battlefield are cast.

card.name: Limrase, The Void Sent
card.text: As long as Limrase is your commander, you can include any colorless cards in your library, regardless of it's color identity. Flying. If you would loose the game or an opponent would win the game the first time each turn, that player instead dose not, if that player would be reduced to 0 or less life their life total becomes 5 instead.

card.name: Tiamat, The Prismatic
card.text: Devoid, Protection from mono-color and Colorless, Flying. Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play a card of each card type from the top of your library each turn.

card.name: Bahamut, The Platinum
card.text: Flying, Lifelink, Convoke. Bahamut, enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {t}, Remove all counters from you and Bahamut: Exile the top card of your library, you may play that card this turn, if it is a dragon card you may play it without paying it's mana cost, then repeat this process for each counter removed this way.

card.name: Hamell, Feasted Bounty
card.text: Whenever a player sacrifices one or more nontoken permanents, create a food token. Whenever you sacrifice a noncreature permanent, create a 1/1 black skeleton creature token. "Come now and feast to your heart's desire, I know I know, I look just so darn delectable, but don't worry, no one goes to waste here."

card.name: Baba Danda
card.text: Tap two creatures you control: Tap or untap target artifact, creature or land. {g}{w}{u}{b}: Target land becomes a 4/4 elemental creature until the start of your next turn. "Regrets are all I have left at my age."

card.name: Rayr of Shangri La
card.text:
If a player would tap a permanent for mana it adds an additional mana that permanent could produce. If a player would draw one or more cards, that player draws that many plus one instead.
Players cannot tap permanents unless it is for mana abilities or attacking, also spells and abilities cannot prevent players from drawing cards.

If a player would tap a permanent for mana it adds an additional mana that permanent could produce. If a player would draw one or more cards, that player draws that many plus one instead.
Players cannot tap permanents unless it is for mana abilities or attacking, also spells and abilities cannot prevent players from drawing cards.

card.text:

Way of the Sun Soul — Whenever 1 or more counters is put on Ashra'Zul, she deals damage equal to her power to target creature or planeswalker, execs damage is dealt to it's controller.
